name: ALSNewsToday
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The ALS News Today skill offers Alexa users access to a daily flash briefing on the news and columns published on the ALS News Today website. Reaching over 60,000 Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis patients and caregivers monthly, ALS News' goal is to bring the latest science, research and advocacy news to the ALS community online. The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
